text: The 1985 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament was played in Tulsa, Oklahoma after the conclusion of the 1984–1985 regular season. The won their first MVC Tournament title to earn an automatic bid to the 1985 NCAA Tournament. ==Bracket== ==References== Category:1984–85 Missouri Valley Conference men's basketball season Category:Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1985 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
